item.description:
Due to a scheduling conflict, the December Plone meetup will be combined with the December Django meetup. We'd like to invite all Plonistas to attend this special meetup where James Tauber will talk about the Pinax Project, a open-source platform built on Django that dramatically reduces the time it takes to develop Web sites. Like Plone, Django is built on top of Python.
More details at http://django.meetup....

If the Plone attendees are interested, we can cover what happened at the World Plone Day. Bring any Plone questions you have and we'll try to answer them as well.

Location: http://tinyurl.com/28... [googlemap]
The Betahouse entrance is the first door in the brick building and is just a couple blocks west of Mass Ave in Central Square, Cambridge, MA.
item.name: The Boston Plone December Meetup
